name: cordova-plugin-splashscreen-DashBoard-ios
description: iOS Unit DashBoards for Splashscreen Plugin
author: Apache Software Foundation

scripts.DashBoard: xcodebuild DashBoard -workspace CDVSplashScreenDashBoard.xcworkspace -scheme CDVSplashScreenLibDashBoards -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5' CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR='/tmp'
